Vidip Ghosh
+91 9650885944| vidip2001@gmail.com| linkedin.com/in/ghoshvidip26| github.com/ghoshvidip26
Summary
Software Engineer(Backend) skilled in building API-driven systems and backend services using Node.js, Python,
and SQL/NoSQL databases.  Skilled in designing scalable workflows and working across the SDLC, with
exposure to Generative AI and RAG-based systems.
